name: Wizard's Castle
overview: Your task is to locate a jewel which is hidden behind a locked door in the wizard's castle. There are 4 levels to be explored containing monsters, life restoring potions and magical acorns. When the jewel is found the wizard will be banished to the icy wastes. The game was included on the cassette for the Micro User magazine 3.10, December 1985. Note: The game's title is Wizard's Castle: the cassette box coverart, however, has the word Wizard spelled as Wizzard.
